remarks: De Morgan's law for polarity of projective sum.  ( ~ oldmj1 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 7-Mar-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
paddun.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
paddun.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
paddun.o $e |- ._|_ = ( _|_P ` K ) $.
poldmj1N $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ S C_ A /\ T C_ A ) -> ( ._|_ ` ( S .+ T ) ) = ( ( ._|_ ` S ) i^i ( ._|_ ` T ) ) ) $.
